entry.title: Online (but not Open Access) Journals from Maney and a Free Trial
entry.content:
[First posted in AWOL 5 August 2010. Updated 15 September 2011]

Maney is offering a 30 day free trial to MORE (Maney Online Research E-journal) Collections. Of particular note to AWOL readers is MORE Archaeology & Heritage.

Online Journals relating to antiquity and archaeology from Maney Publishing include:
  • Arms & Armour  - Complete online archive from 2004
  • Bulletin of the Council for British Research in the Levant  - 2006 onwards
  • Byzantine and Modern Greek Studies  - Complete online archive from 1975
  • Conservation and Management of Archaeological Sites  - 2006 onwards
  • Early Medieval China  - Complete online archive from 1994
  • Environmental Archaeology  - Complete online archive from 1998 
  • Industrial Archaeology Review  - Complete online archive from 1979  
  • Journal of Conflict Archaeology - Complete online archive from 2005
  • Journal of Field Archaeology  - Complete online archive from 1974
  • Journal of the British Archaeological Association  - Online archive from 1980
  • Levant  - Complete online archive from 1969
  • Medieval Archaeology  - 2000 onwards
    Medieval Sermon Studies  - 2006 onwards
  • Palestine Exploration Quarterly  - 2004 onwards
  • Post-Medieval Archaeology  - 2005 onwards
  • Public Archaeology  - 2007 onwards
  • T'ang Studies  - Complete online archive from 1982
    Tel Aviv: Journal of the Institute of Archaeology of Tel Aviv University  - Complete online archive from 1974 
  • The Historic Environment: Policy & Practice  - Complete online archive from 2010
  • Terrae Incognitae: Journal of the Society for the History of Discoveries  - Complete online archive from 1969  
  • Yorkshire Archaeological Journal - Complete online archive from 2010 
If your institutions subscribes to any or all of these, the links should resolve within your domain, or proxy.  If not, contact your library.

The full list of Journals available online from Maney.
